nodes.title: Response code for AllureOkHttp3 has been fixed
Selenide step also can be Broken
JUnit5 updates: @DisplayName for test class + @Description for test method
[Cucumber JVM] Handle composite tags with empty value part
Fixed readme and templates for allure-okhttp
Add Cucumber Examples as Test Parameters in Allure Report
feat(spock-geb): Added spock-geb support to allure
Add output format to fix issue #147
Fix npe with parameters from Allure 1 annotations
Made the request body optional for RestAssuredFilter (fixes #125)
Added ScenarioUtils.getScenarioUuid(Scenario) for safe UUIDs generation
Handle tests with PENDING steps (PendingException) as skipped
Default package name processing for JUnit4 listener
Add plain link support for cucumber-jvm fixes #124
Support for execution of steps in any thread. (fixes #122\)
Combining Repeatable annotations on method and on class
Fix npe with Ignore annotation on classes in JUnit4
NPE on assertThat call with nullable objects (fixes #115)
fix junit4 aspect for gradle tests
Add support for skipped and ignored tests in JUnit4 (fixes #112)
Add suite and package for JUnit 5 tests
Add assertj integration, rft lifecycle, add commons test module (also fixes #68)
extract migrations for junit4 and testng
[cucumberjvm] Now severity can be parsed by tag name
Test which covers TestNG suite with parameter
Wrong class name for Rest Assured example
support for Flaky, Epic, Feature, Issue, Link, Muted, Owner, Severity…
junit4 aspect listener + local spi-off distribution fixes
Introduce protected api for testng adaptor (fixes #45)
Rft steps names processing, process attachment names (fixes #50)
[BUGFIX] NPE in StepsAspect while passing null-arg (fixes allure2 #350)
Fix flaky/muted/known absence on failed tests
fix parallel methods test, fix stub writer, fix labels extracting
Add support for test instance params for TestNG
[cucumber-jvm] Add attachments to allure reports using cucumber api
Rewrite getHistoryId to join test results for rerun tests
bump cucumber version for windows fix
Refactor to use custom render in case when custom publisher is used
Clean up build file and more deprecations
Fix fixtures for parallel testng execution
Aggregate all hooks in Before or After super-step fo cucumberjvm-2/3/4
Add possibility to use custom marker labels
Fixes #291 - support for multiple Examples blocks per Scenario Outline
Added transforming method names to readable format
Cucumber JVM 4.x support with dry-run bugfix and refactoring
Use blocking io for results write
Make steps and attachments fields of ExecutableItem to be thread-safe
Add support for array parameters for TestNG
Display disabled tests in the report for TestNG
Add test result per failed configuration for TestNG
Fix parameters processing for migrations module
Add support for given stories for JBehave
Fix invocation of listeners after method
Add more tests for step aspects
Add host and thread labels for junit platform tests
Fix parallel run and rft lifecycle
Description processing fix for inner class param type
Add New filter for JAX-RS based clients
Fix concurrency when running steps in parallel
Fixed bug: ReflectException has been thrown in test when step parameter field does not exist
Fixing issue when OkHttp request method in attachment is always GET
Fixed javadoc description processing for methods with the same names
Added loading of allure properties from context class loader
allure-selenide: fix for latest version dependency
Versions for rest-assured and retrofit has been updated
Display hook names in report (Cucumber JVM 2.x)
Fix of IOException in apache httpclient integration
Examples for rest-assured and okHttp3 has been added
Filling Fixture field htmlDescription from javaDoc description
Fix NPEs when using @Parameter with private or uninitialized fields
AllureSelenide configuration for screenshots and page source
Attach screenshots and page source based on selenide config.
Added possibility to separate lines in javadoc description
Curl '-d' for HttpRequestAttachment has been fixed
- fixed allure steps processing for testng and junit4 tests with time…
Fixed processing of steps for tests with timeout (fixes #669), added line separation for javadoc description
Handle Test failures with Exceptions without message
Fixed all NPEs in junit-runner due to missing actual class (fixes #174)
Allow embedding attachments and other allure steps in cucumber hook steps
Fix updates in Cucumber tests with fixtures (fixes #483)
Open some `AllureTestNg` methods for extension + refactoring
Bump actions/checkout from v1 to v2.3.4
Bump actions/labeler from v2 to v3
Bump toolmantim/release-drafter from v5.2.0 to v5.15.0
Fix face test case creation in Allure TestOps
Add screenshots for passed steps feature for allure-java
Gh 458 - create attachments from the TestNg's data providers
Implement equals & hashCode in Link class
Epic, Story, Feature annotation @Inherited does not work
Cucumber gherkin version 15.0.2 to support cucumber 6.9.0
added specific request and response attachment name method for AllureRestAssured filter.
Disable test case creation for configuration failure results
Fix incorrect UUID usage in StepUtils (fix #467)
fix link() method with one parameter
Add @Secret annotation to mask data in steps
Add method name and request url to the attachment name
Use Javadoc descriptions globally if system property "allure.description.fromjavadoc" is set.
add support of scala 2.13 for allure-scalatest
allure-selenide: adding a setting to include Selenide locators as steps (default = true)
allure-selenide: adding a setting to includeSelenideLocators as steps (default = true)
add step in allure report for spock framework
Adds support of Junit 5 assertions in report
Cucumber 5 Jvm api changes support for allure (fixes #414)
Revert "Add test case id for junit 5 tests"
Add test case id for junit 5 tests
Add support for scenario descriptions for CucumberJVM
💥 Add support for test fixtures for JUnit Jupiter
fixing the reporting of skipped/aborted tests in @BeforeAll methods #399
Add request and response time to HttpResponseAttachment/HttpRequestAttachment
[Fix] Use name if not null while creating Link
Update to use non-deprecated JBehave API

Extract step value from param method call
#379 Do not take screenshot if browser is not opened yet
update pmd, replace deprecations, set RELEASE 12 version
Add ability to attach selenium logs in case of test failure
Add support for recursive meta annotations
Use feature file paths for CucumberJVM package name
Update cucumber-jvm to latest cucumber2 version
Update selenide plugin related to latest selenide changes:
Added Interceptor for unary & server streaming gRPC calls
Add gRPC integration as gRPC client interceptor

adding property flag to include/ignore failed configuration steps in allure report
Shadow jackson deps and remove deprecations
